name: Trail of Taijitu
description:
The Trial of Taijitu is played on a field of 7 discs revolving around the symbol of duality. You control 3 alternate discs while the AI controls the other 3; the final disc closest to the centre spins on its own accord.

The object of the game is to spin the discs so that 3 or more gems match up on your side of the play area. You have 3 minutes to beat the AI and don’t think that this will be an easy task…

Can you win the Trial of Taijitu?

Music by Gavin Koh @ https://soundcloud.com/gavinkoh/the-emptiness-of-the-void-piano-solo

Gameplay Instructions:

Use left and right arrow keys to switch between your three discs. Use up and down arrow keys to spin the selected disc.
